scripts.package: npm run generate && cd dist && tar.exe -a -c -f ../indigenous-women-timeline_%date%_en.zip * && powershell -Command "(gc imsmanifest.xml) -replace 'en/', 'fr/' | Out-File -encoding ASCII imsmanifest.xml" && tar.exe -a -c -f ../indigenous-women-timeline_%date%_fr.zip * && del /f/q/s *.* > NUL && cd .. && rmdir /q/s dist && echo packages created!
